name: awesome-slash
description: 11 specialized plugins for AI workflow automation - task orchestration, PR workflow, slop detection, code review, drift detection, enhancement analysis, documentation sync, repo mapping, perf investigations, topic research, and agent config linting

plugins.name: next-task
plugins.description: Master workflow orchestrator: autonomous workflow with model optimization (opus/sonnet/haiku), two-file state management, workflow enforcement gates, 14 specialist agents

plugins.name: ship
plugins.description: Complete PR workflow: commit to production, skips review when called from next-task, removes task from registry on cleanup, automatic rollback

plugins.name: deslop
plugins.description: 3-phase AI slop detection: regex patterns (HIGH), multi-pass analyzers (MEDIUM), CLI tools (LOW)

plugins.name: audit-project
plugins.description: Multi-agent iterative code review until zero issues remain

plugins.name: drift-detect
plugins.description: Deep repository analysis to realign project plans with code reality - detects drift, gaps, and creates prioritized reconstruction plans

plugins.name: enhance
plugins.description: Master enhancement orchestrator: parallel analyzer execution for plugins, agents, docs, CLAUDE.md, and prompts with unified reporting

plugins.name: sync-docs
plugins.description: Standalone documentation sync: find outdated refs, update CHANGELOG, flag stale examples based on code changes

plugins.name: repo-map
plugins.description: AST-based repository map generation using ast-grep with incremental updates for faster drift analysis

plugins.name: perf
plugins.description: Rigorous performance investigation workflow with baselines, profiling, hypotheses, and evidence-backed decisions

plugins.name: learn
plugins.description: Research topics online and create comprehensive learning guides with RAG-optimized indexes

plugins.name: agnix
plugins.description: Lint agent configuration files (SKILL.md, CLAUDE.md, hooks, MCP) against 155 rules across 10+ AI tools
